iPhone.Entitlements:
<!-- set to 'development' when debugging your app and set to 'production' when building for adhoc or distribution. --> <key>beta-reports-active</key> <true/> <key>get-task-allow</key> <false/>
<key>aps-environment</key> <string>production</string>
<key>keychain-access-groups</key> <array> <string>Q9VNYYLGZX.*</string> </array>
<key>application-identifier</key> <string>Q9VNYYLGZX.com.nsm.numbersm</string> <key>com.apple.developer.team-identifier</key> <string>Q9VNYYLGZX</string> <key>com.apple.developer.associated-domains</key> <array> <string>applinks:eewq2.app.goo.gl</string> </array>
iPhone.InfoAdditions:
<key>CFBundleIconName</key> <string>AppIcon</string> <key>UIDeviceFamily</key> <array> <!-- iPhone and iPod touch devices --> <string>1</string> <!-- iPad devices --> <string>2</string> </array>
<key>MinimumOSVersion</key> <string>8.0</string> <key>UIRequiredDeviceCapabilities</key> <array> <string>arm64</string> </array>
